response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $800,000. Considering the immense value this product offers, I am extending a special offer to you to purchase it at $750,000. This is an opportunity to own a masterpiece that could appreciate in value over time and serve as a testament to your discerning taste. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing of the product.", "product_price": 750000}
